overview: In this modernized adaptation of Edogawa Ranpo's 1926 novel of the same name, broken-hearted and depressed Kyoko meets the kind and handsome young man Kadono, who she subsequently marries. Their marriage is a happy one, until Kyoko begins to suspect that Kadono may be in love with someone else.
tagline: What did my beloved husband love?
title: The Love of a Brute
